  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • cz.zcu.kiv.multicloud.filesystem.FileDownloadThread

    java.lang.Runnable

    public class FileDownloadThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    cz.zcu.kiv.multicloud.filesystem/FileDownloadThread.java

    Worker thread for downloading partial file content from the storage.

    1.0

    Jaromír Staněk
